item.title: Yak Shaving - Makefiles
item.description: The Problem I woke up this morning wanting to start on a long post about Terraform and how I ended up with the structure shown in my repo. I recently reinstalled my Macbook using Netatalk for a timemachine , and as I fired up my vagrant image, it started to pull down the Ubuntu box first and then started configuring it. This is very useful, but it is slow. And it broke.
